The chief benefits of the plan, as proved by the experience of England, France and other European countries where it has been in force, may be gen erally summarized under three heads: Eirst General health of all people benefited by reason of an added hour of daylight in the late afternoon, which has been and will be u-ed for outdoor recre ation and exercise. When these motorcycles are secured and put In commission, woe betide the motorist who drives his machine faster than Is reasonable and proper for pub lic safety. Commissioner Gates Intro duced the recommendation before the board yesterday that the council be Instructed to purchase two of the best motorcycles that money can buy and have them equipped with the nsst In struments for determining: speed.
